settings.title: Copper Compression Influencer Program
settings.text: Welcome to Copper Compression's Influencer Program! We're always excited to team up with creative influencers.

settings.title: The Original Arch Supports
settings.text: Soothe your daily foot pain with our copper-infused arch supports! These comfortable, ultra-thin bands can be worn all day under shoes, socks or even sandals. Simply slip them on to lift your arches, reduce muscle strain and redistribute pressure across your feet.

settings.title: The Half Finger Arthritis Gloves
settings.text: Relieve constant pain and swelling in your wrists, hands and fingers with our copper-infused compression gloves. Using targeted compression, these gloves help to increase nutrient-rich blood flow and restrict the build up of excess fluid.

settings.title: The PowerKnit Knee Sleeve
settings.text: Stabilize your knees and go the extra mile! Engineered with our seamless PowerKnit™ technology, this sleeve supports and warms muscles in your knees, helping them to fire faster and reach peak output. It also helps to stabilize your joints, prevent injuries and facilitate active recovery.

settings.title: Feel the Difference.
settings.content: Don’t let injuries and inflammation affect your daily passions. Copper Compression sleeves and braces are lightweight, anti-microbial, and suited for everyday active movement and recovery. Choose from our most popular pain relief and recovery products.
